title: Let's make this a true holiday - allen and ginter
author: 1880nonsports

posts.post_title: Let's make this a true holiday - allen and ginter
posts.post_content:
As noted below - Allen and Ginter N43 LARGE sized champions cards..........

When I first started looking these cards were three times older than I am. At this point they're only twice as old as me. I'm healthy but the prospect of facing the next "milestone" is uncomfortable. Please help to put me out these two sets to rest before people do so to me!! At least getting the TWO CARDS I need to finish my first set would make a statement. happy.gif I'm most likely to overpay for the last card I need in a set. 

 missing first set: 

 Edwards
 Wood

 upgrade first set:

 Ryan
 Ewing
 McGee
 Pettitt

 

 missing second set (lower grade - minor wear & bd ok): 

 temple 
 queckenberner 
 lablanche 
 cummings
Hi Henry- you forgot to mention which set...N29 or N43? I know which one, but others may not.
I wrote a couple of times but maybe you'll see this :-) - hoping you and your wife will stop by again should you head this way! I'll try and behave better..........

You behaved impeccably, and I will call you in January.:)

And I responded on one of your earlier notes to me, you probably just didn't see it.
